chapters.title: Chapter 30:  Outside the Gates
chapters.info:
Aldin,
      p. 647—Tall, young,
      Amadician gai'shain.  He has square shoulders, and looks more a
      soldier than the bookkeeper he is.  He has taken a liking to
      Arrela and wants to marry her,
      though she does not actually like men in that way.…
      See also
      Shiego, Arrela.
